title: My firewall wont let me download or play league
body: can anybody tell me a solution, thanks

replies.body:
If you're sure it's your firewall that's causing that, it won't hurt to close it for a while (: 
Switch it off, patch League and turn it back on. You should be able to **play** loL fine with your firewall on, though.
A lot of people are currently experiencing this issue, and no, it's not likely your firewall preventing it from connecting. Doesn't hurt to check, though.
